text: Among the many possible committee estimators, two of the most prominent strategies may be a) bagging and b) boosting. While both have straightforward implementations, there is variation in the literature. It may therefore be both high-yield to implement both meta-estimators in nilearn and thus also increase comparability and standardization in using advanced learning algorithm in neuroimaging.
title: Add bagging and boosting meta-estimators

text:
We are finalizing a paper showcasing the advantage of bagging -- that has particularly welcome variance reduction properties.
Anyhow, PRs are welcome indeed !
